textos_fuente.text: About Us - Gary Rack Restaurant Management Group Skip to content About Us Our Restaurants Press Careers Contact Main Menu About Us Our Restaurants Press Careers Contact About Us Our mission is delivering better guest experiences Our Story Gary Rack Restaurant Group, founded by entrepreneur Gary Rack, delivers complete management and operations services in South Florida with a three-restaurant track record thus far, continuously evolving into a more dynamic organization. We work with clients who share our dedication to creating spectacular guest experiences with the perfect blend of amazing food and a fun atmosphere. And, we do it with the help of our expert executive chef, Demetrio Zavala. Forward-thinking diners will love our restaurants’ modern take on traditional dishes, and our staff members are trained extensively in providing the best experiences possible for guests. We ensure our values are instilled in every team so diners get consistent high-end service in a laid-back environment. Hip, Unique Ambiance Relax in style at our chic, modern restaurants Remarkable Cuisine Exceptionally fresh, farm-to-table meals Outstanding Service Friendly and attentive staff Our Specialties Try our food made by real people, with love Farmhouse Kitchen Farm-to-table concept that serves local ingredients sourced by South Florida vendors RACK'S FISH HOUSE The freshest South Florida seafood prepared in a simple and delicious way Meet The Team Gary Rack Founder & Owner Gary Rack is a self-made entrepreneur who lives life to the fullest. He is a true family man, building his restaurants and management group with family values in mind. He believes in putting quality time with family and friends first, alongside some amazing food and wine. Gary treats his staff like they’re part of the family. He says, “There is no greater reward than to watch your employees succeed to the point where you’ve bettered their lives, their financial ability, and their quality of living. We believe in coaching and training employees to understand that hard work, dedication, integrity, and honesty will lead them down the road of financial success, freedom, and stability within our company.” Gary created Gary Rack Restaurant Management Group so he could share his love of food and combine it with an exceptional dining culture. He opened FarmHouse Boca and Racks Fish House + Oyster Bar, followed by FarmHouse Delray, with the help of a renowned executive chef who aligned with Gary’s vision for a better guest experience. Neighborhood dining in South Florida will never be the same, as Gary has created places for all to gather and enjoy unique dishes and concepts. Demetrio Zavala Directory of Culinary Demetrio Zavala joins the Gary Rack Restaurant Management Group after an already successful career. He’s appeared on the Food Network numerous times, on various TV shows, and is an eight-time Chopped Champion. He started his career in Washington, D.C., and worked under several famous chefs in New York, becoming more and more interested in farm-to-table cooking. He started growing his own vegetables so he supports seasonal menus, sometimes changing them every six weeks. He has also worked at a Michelin-rated restaurant and has other high-end experience that helps him deliver uniquely delicious dishes. Demetrio’s father was in the military, so he was born at Fort Carson army base in Colorado but grew up in Delray Beach, Florida. He now has kids and grandchildren, and he’s proud to have a son that plays football and a daughter in the military. If you are looking for a casual restaurant with great American food? This is the place to be! Amazing food, inspiring libations, live entertainment and beautiful ocean views! Open Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday & Thursday -11:00- 9:00 Friday, Saturday, & Sunday- 11:00 - 10:00 Email scott@tortugasflorida.com Phone (386) 439-0098 Office 608 S Ocean Shore Blvd, Website Click to View Visit website Facebook Like on Facebook Instagram Follow on Instagram Twitter Follow on Twitter LinkedIn Follow on LinkedIn YouTube Subscribe on YouTube TikTok Follow on TikTok View services Services Services & Information American Cuisine Live Entertainment Happy Hour Catering No items found. Average star rating: No ratings yet We had a great view, awesome service & great food. After several days of rain, we were looking for dinner with a view. I had the chicken tacos & my husband had the pork belly tacos, both had Caribbean rice. Shout out to our server Christiana, she was excellent. We will definitely be back. -P.G. Nice bar/restaurant by the beach. Live music. It was crowded but the food and service was great. We sat outdoors and it started raining but the servers were helpful and moved our table under the shelter and drew some curtain things down to help shield the rain from getting in the patio area. We enjoyed the wings and frozen Pina Coladas. They also had a cute photo spot with a greenery backstop and a lighted sign that says "Island Vibes". -Eyleah Molinski Promotions Special Offers and Discounts for You Check out the latest coupons and special promotions from our featured vendor.
